channel.title: Copilot Studio on Sujith Quintelier
channel.description: Recent content in Copilot Studio on Sujith Quintelier

item.title: azure: [In preview] Public Preview: Azure Databricks Genie in Copilot Studio
item.description:
Microsoft has announced the public preview of Azure Databricks Genie in Copilot Studio, providing direct access to intelligent, enterprise-grade AI answers across the full Azure Databricks data estate and enabling conversational analytics.

  • Source: Azure Updates

item.title: dotnet: How Copilot Studio uses .NET and WebAssembly for performance and innovation
item.description:
Microsoft explains how Copilot Studio uses .NET to run AI agents consistently across platforms and to bring performant, innovative agent execution to the web via WebAssembly.

  • Source: .NET
